alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 5:53PM MDT until April 12 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LYON...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTH CENTRAL ROCK... PIPESTONE...NORTHWESTERN MURRAY AND SOUTHEASTERN MOODY COUNTIES... At 653 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trosky, or near Pipestone, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holland, Woodstock, Lake Wilson, Ruthton, Florence and Current Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
